author: The Current
description:
Lady Blackbird performs two songs from 'Slang Spirituals' at The Current
Support The Current: https://support.mpr.org/youtube or hit the Thanks button

While touring across North America in support of her second full-length album, Slang Spirituals, Lady Blackbird was in town for a show at the Dakota in Minneapolis. The day of the concert, Lady Blackbird and her guitarist and record producer, Chris Seefried, visited The Current to play a couple songs from the new album.

Songs Performed
00:00:00 Like a Woman
00:04:07 Man on a Boat
Both songs from Lady Blackbird’s 2024 album, Slang Spirituals, available on Foundation Music / BMG.

Musicians 
Lady Blackbird (Marley Munroe) – vocals
Chris Seefried – guitar

Credits
Guest – @IAmLadyBlackbird 
Host – Jessica Paxton
Producer – Derrick Stevens
Audio – Josh Sauvageau
Video – Evan Clark
Graphics – Natalia Toledo
Digital Producer – Luke Taylor

Subscribe to our channel:
http://www.youtube.com/user/893TheCurrent?sub_confirmation=1  

Like/Follow:
title: Lady Blackbird performs a two-song set in The Current studio

author: The Current
description:
Lady Blackbird talks about new album 'Slang Spirituals' at The Current
Support The Current: https://support.mpr.org/youtube or hit the Thanks button

While touring across North America in support of her second full-length album, Slang Spirituals, Lady Blackbird was in town for a show at the Dakota in Minneapolis. The day of the concert, Lady Blackbird and her guitarist and record producer, Chris Seefried, visited The Current to play a couple songs from the new album. Afterwards, host Jessica Paxton spoke to Lady Blackbird and Chris Seefried. Watch that conversation above.

author: The Current
description:
To celebrate The Current’s 20th Anniversary, The Current’s Live Sessions Vault unlocks never-before-seen live performance videos of bands and artists who have played in our iconic studio. 

Watch to see the full session of Howler, featuring previously unreleased footage, from when they visited The Current studio back in 2014.

Songs Performed 
00:00:00 20 Drip
00:01:58 Indictment
00:05:28 The Itch That Creeps Through My Skull

Musicians
Jordan Gatesmith — lead vocals, guitar
Ian Nygaard — guitar
Yayo Trujillo — bass
Hiram Sevilla — drums

Credits
Engineer – Mike DeMark
Producer – Lindsay Kimball
Visuals  – Nate Ryan
Digital Producer – Natalia Toledo
Graphics – Natalia Toledo

The Current’s Live Sessions Vault is supported by the Minnesota Orchestra, GS Motors, and Delta Dental of Minnesota Foundation.

title: Howler - Full live session at The Current (2014)

author: The Current
description:
Watch Samia and her band perform "Dare" in studio
Support The Current: https://support.mpr.org/youtube or hit the Thanks button

Singer-songwriter Samia releases her second full-length album, 'Bloodless,' on April 25, 2025. Just a few weeks before the release, Samia visited The Current studio with some of her musical collaborators to perform four songs off the new album. Watch and listen to a performance of "Dare" above.

Musicians
Samia Finnerty – vocals
Sam Rosenstone – keyboards, vocals
Jake Luppen – electric guitar, vocals
Nathan Stocker – six- and 12-string guitar, vocals

Credits
Guest – @samiatheband 
Host – Jessica Paxton
Producer – Derrick Stevens
Audio – Evan Clark
Video – Ruben Schneiderman
Camera Operators – Derek Ramirez, Ruben Schneiderman
Graphics – Natalia Toledo
Digital Producer – Luke Taylor
